com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface

Interface ScriptHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptHelperImpl

    public interface ScriptHelper
    Exposes a number of useful java based utilities to JavaScript endpoints.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Logger ScriptLogger 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns a ByteBuffer that will be automatically cleaned up once the transaction completes.

      Locate a sun.net.www.MimeEntry by the file extension that has been associated with it.

      Locate a sun.net.www.MimeEntry by it's MIMEType
      String formatDate(long millisecondsSinceEpoch)
      Format millisecond based date into a GMT string compatible with HTTP headers protocol.

    • Method Detail

      • createBuffer

        ByteBuffer createBuffer()
        Returns a ByteBuffer that will be automatically cleaned up once the transaction completes.

      • getScheme

        String getScheme()
        Returns http or https scheme of this transaction

      • makeAbsoluteUrl

        String makeAbsoluteUrl(String location)
        Convert (if necessary) and return the absolute URL that represents the resource referenced by this possibly relative URL. If this URL is already absolute, return it unchanged. This method would typically be used to compute a 302 redirect url.
        Parameters:
        location - URL to be (possibly) converted and then returned
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a MalformedURLException is thrown when converting the relative URL to an absolute one

      • getAcceptableLocales

        String[] getAcceptableLocales()
        Return the language Locales accepted by the requesting client in order of preference (best to least).

      • findMimeEntryByType

        sun.net.www.MimeEntry findMimeEntryByType(String mimeType)
        Locate a sun.net.www.MimeEntry by it's MIMEType

      • findMimeEntryByExt

        sun.net.www.MimeEntry findMimeEntryByExt(String ext)
        Locate a sun.net.www.MimeEntry by the file extension that has been associated with it.

      • getLocalAddress

        InetAddress getLocalAddress()
        Return the underlying local InetAddress for this request / response transaction

      • getLocalPort

        int getLocalPort()
        Return the underlying local socket port for this request / response transaction

      • getRemoteAddress

        InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Return the underlying remote InetAddress for this request / response transaction

      • getRemotePort

        int getRemotePort()
        Return the underlying remote socket port for this request / response transaction

      • getHOSTName

        String getHOSTName()
        Returns the host name as seen by the calling client. This method examines the HOST header (which is an HTTP required header). If not available for some reason, this method will do a name lookup on the local address of this http connection.

      • getHOSTPort

        int getHOSTPort()
        Returns the host port as seen by the calling client. This method examines the HOST header (which is an HTTP required header). Per the standard, if the port is not specified in the header (or the header does not exist), the default 443 or 80 is returned.

      • getCharacterEncoding

        String getCharacterEncoding()
        Returns the charset of the Content-Type header

      • getHTTPDateFormater

        DateFormat getHTTPDateFormater()
        Get a new date formatter compatible with HTTP headers protocol. SPECIFICALLY... This means: The parser will parse GMT and return local time. The formatter will take a local time and output a GMT string.

      • formatDate

        String formatDate(long millisecondsSinceEpoch)
        Format millisecond based date into a GMT string compatible with HTTP headers protocol.
        Parameters:
        millisecondsSinceEpoch - URL to be (possibly) converted and then returned
